title: Episode 121 (corrected): Top 10 Psychology Apps for the iPad, iPhone, & IPod
description: In this video episode I show you 10 of what I consider to be the best psychology apps in the app store.  There are a lot of apps out there and many are not so good, but in this episode I pick out what I consider to be credible therapy apps, excellent  mobile mind mapping tools, relaxation apps, games based on Gestalt principles of psychology, and some of the best 3 dimensional ways to look at the brain.

author: Michael.Britt@ThePsychFiles.com (Michael Britt)
